definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: They are marching off to gyms and discovering face cream in record numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他們向健身房進軍，物色到的面霜數目已創歷史新高。

sentences.english: Results will usually be better than if you spend 2 hours lolly-gagging around the gym. But be warned.
sentences.chinese: 而且效果通常比你在健身房晃盪兩小時來得好。

sentences.english: Does your apartment have a gym onsite?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓內有健身房嗎？

sentences.english: I want to go to a gym with aerobics.
sentences.chinese: 我要去健身房跳有氧操。

sentences.english: A room or building equipped for indoor sports.
sentences.chinese: 健身房一個用來進行室內運動的房間或建築。

sentences.english: I overdid it in the gym and hurt my back.
sentences.chinese: 我在健身房練得過火了，結果弄傷了背。

sentences.english: Desk exercises are as important as those you do in a gym.
sentences.chinese: 辦公桌旁的鍛鍊和你在健身房裏的鍛鍊一樣重要。

sentences.english: And I love to go to gym. Keep muscle, make strong.
sentences.chinese: 我還很喜歡去健身房，做運動強健身體。

sentences.english: Nancy and Tonya both work out at the same gym.
sentences.chinese: 南希和託尼亞在同一家健身房訓練。

sentences.english: I saved money by not paying a trainer whether I went to the gym or not.
sentences.chinese: 無論去不去健身房，我都省下了僱教練的錢。

sentences.english: The gym did its research before opting to chase the nudist euro.
sentences.chinese: 健身房在向天體主義者的歐元招手前，做過調查。

sentences.english: Bring your old magazines to the gym so other people can read them.
sentences.chinese: 把你的舊雜誌送去健身房，讓別人也能閱讀。

sentences.english: I also do a great deal of work in the weight room, including squats.
sentences.chinese: 我也在健身房進行了大量的力量練習，包括深蹲。

sentences.english: Student then repeatedly kicks the door until she comes out and flees the gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 學生然後不停地踢門直到她跑出來並逃離健身房。

sentences.english: Pow!") and orgy-at-a-keep-fit-class music that accompanies it.
sentences.chinese: 和伴隨進球時那種健身房式的音樂把我們都逗樂了。

sentences.english: Rolla Residence has a small pool and fitness.
sentences.chinese: 這家旅館還有一個小型游泳池和健身房。

definition: to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
